description: The retention of the north east facade (facing Childers St) of S R House, Childers Street SE8, and the demolition of the remaining building and erection of part 5, part 6 storey new building comprising 1,243 sq. metres of flexible commercial floorspace (within Class B1/D1) and 83 residential units, including cycle storage, communal amenity roof space, living roof and infrastructure works.
